story.title: Unseen and Unheard - Episode 3
story.storyDescription: Why is Heather‚Äôs boyfriend talking to her like she isn‚Äôt there?
story.creator: web-uploader

author.bio: Charlie Poe is a former Virginia police officer who enjoys writing mysteries and horror. Follow him to read more stories like Unseen and Unheard.

story.prePaywallNotification: Woah! Heather isn‚Äôt just dead‚Ä¶she‚Äôs stuck on Earth as a ghost üëª Tap back into Hooked to see if she stays that way forever.
story.postPaywallNotification: Will Professor Thomas be able to help Heather? ü§û Tap back into Hooked to find out.

messages.text: There has to be some reason‚Äî
There has to be an explanation for how and why I‚Äôm still here.
Wait ‚Äî Kira!
What?
No one else can talk to me. But you can.
Okay, so what?
So‚Ä¶you can talk to all those other people for me.
You can get in touch with Jax! And we can figure this out.
Hmm‚Ä¶you‚Äôre right. Maybe he‚Äôll be able to put together a missing step.
If nothing else‚Ä¶I can at least tell him I love him. Through you.
Ugh, okay fine. I‚Äôll help.
Kira texts Heather‚Äôs boyfriend.
Hey, Jax. It‚Äôs Kira. I need your help.
Hey, Kira. What‚Äôs up?
Ok, Jax, this is going to sound crazy‚Ä¶but Heather is still here.
Well, sort of.
Kira, that‚Äôs not funny. I‚Äôm not in the mood.
Jax, she‚Äôs my best friend. I‚Äôm not playing around.
I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on, but somehow, she‚Äôs still here. She‚Äôs been texting me.
Kira, you‚Äôre in shock‚Äî
Believe me, I miss her too.
Kira texts Heather.
He isn‚Äôt buying it.
Tell him that I love him even though he has fish feet.
What?
Just do it.
Jax, she said that she loves you even though you have fish feet?
Where are you?
The Pizzeria. Does fish feet mean something?
It‚Äôs an inside joke only Heather would know.
Stay right where you are. I‚Äôll be there as soon as I can.
I‚Äôm going to bring someone who might be able to help.
Who?
Professor Thomas.
Kira texts Heather.
Jax said he‚Äôs heading here and going to bring Professor Thomas.
OMG. That‚Äôs brilliant.
I never had him as a teacher. I just know he‚Äôs super weird.
But that‚Äôs exactly it‚Ä¶he loves supernatural stuff.
He‚Äôs got at least 20 books on ghosts and aliens and other crazy stuff.
If anyone would know anything about how to fix this messed up situation, it‚Äôd be him.
Well, hopefully he has some answers for us.
1 hour later
Jax is pulling up now with Professor Thomas.
I can see them! Quick‚Äî
Show them your phone, so they can see.
Okay.
Heather? This is Jax on Kira‚Äôs phone. Is that really you?
Yes, baby. I can see you. But I can‚Äôt hear you‚Ä¶
It‚Äôs like being underwater.
I love you. We‚Äôre going to figure this out.
I love you, too.
I‚Äôm going to pass the phone to the Professor, now.
Okay.
Heather? This is Professor Thomas. Are you there?
Yes, Professor. But I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs going on.
Extraordinary. Somehow you‚Äôve managed to move into a different plane of existence‚Ä¶
On your plane, you‚Äôre not quite living, yet, not quite dead.
What can we do?
I think we need to figure out why it happened first.
I‚Äôve read a lot of stories where someone undertakes a metaphysical existence because they have ‚Äúunfinished business.‚Äù
Can you think of anything you‚Äôve left unfinished?
No. I can‚Äôt even wrap my mind around being in a different plane than you guys‚Äî
You‚Äôre literally 3 feet in front of me. Isn‚Äôt there a way to get back?
I don‚Äôt know. What do you remember from the accident?
I remember leaving the party, angry. I was driving along I-87. And then‚Ä¶
Nothing.
It‚Äôs like my memory is wiped.
I heard you had a fight with Jax and then you were struck by a drunk driver. Is that right?
I guess.
And they haven‚Äôt found the driver, right?
Yes.
Hmm‚Ä¶what if your unfinished business is to find the truck driver?
Could it really be that simple?
Only one way to find out!
Let‚Äôs go to the site of the accident and look for clues. We‚Äôll drive there‚Äî
If my understanding of the metaphysical is correct, you should be able to ride in the car as well.
Okay‚Ä¶
I‚Äôm going to pass Kira‚Äôs phone back to her. We‚Äôll touch base again once we‚Äôre at the scene.
Heather, are you ready for this?
I‚Äôm ready for anything that might give us answers.
Ok, I get that. It‚Äôs just that‚Ä¶
This guy, he‚Äôs even weirder than I thought.
My skin is legit crawling around him‚Ä¶
He seems, idk, excited?
Something about him just makes me feel really uncomfortable.
I‚Äôm a little uneasy, too.
But right now, he‚Äôs my only hope.
Listen though, if you give your phone back to him‚Ä¶
Delete these texts ‚Äî okay, Kira?
He might get angry if he sees them.
Yeah. Definitely.
Welp, off we go‚Ä¶
